alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rensselaer County through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Greenbush, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Greenbush, Rensselaer, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Sand Lake, Poestenkill, Totem Lodge, East Schodack, East Poestenkill, West Stephentown, Millers Corners, Taborton, Barberville, Glass Lake, East Greenbush Station, Denault Corners, Shivers Corners, Hampton Manor, Best and Luther. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York.
